name: Chocolate Delight
author: Renee
summary: This is the most delightful chocolate dessert that you will ever taste!
ingredients: 2 (8 or 9 inch) baked round chocolate cake layers, cooled
2 (5.9 ounce) packages instant chocolate pudding mix
6 (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered toffee bars, chopped
2 (12 ounce) containers frozen whipped topping, thawed
directions: Cut chocolate cake into large squares and place on a baking sheet or large baking dish (see Cook's Note)
Pour coffee-flavored liqueur over cake and set aside
Prepare chocolate pudding with milk according to package directions
In large trifle bowl or other glass bowl, crumble half of liqueur-moistened cake
Top cake with half of chocolate pudding, half of crumbled candy bars, and one container of whipped topping
Repeat with remaining cake, pudding, candy bars, and Cool Whip®
Shave chocolate with a vegetable peeler for garnish; sprinkle over top of dessert
